question: Well i have been having these constant yeast infections before and after my periods. I had unstable menstrual periods too when the yeast infections started. My periods used to come and then stop for 2-3 months at a time. I did a pap smear and it was normal. I had a HIV test which was negative. Also i checked my blood for diabetes and that was ok.My doctor was also saying i should look into polycystic ovarian syndrome. Because i remember when i because having missed periods in 2005-6 i got facial hair too on my face in addition to the yeast infection.Please help I am clueless.
title: Missed periods, yeast infections, etc
